lead_paragraph: President-elect Donald J. Trump is turning not to a cautious corporate chieftain, but to somebody usually considered either a hero or a villain.

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Michael Forsythe, Jack Ewing, Alexandra Stevenson and Michael J. de la Merced.

headline.print_headline: ‘Vulture’ or ‘Phoenix,’ a Risk Taker for Commerce
headline.main: ‘Vulture’ or ‘Phoenix’? Wilbur Ross, Risk-Taker, Is Eyed for Commerce Post

snippet: President-elect Donald J. Trump is turning not to a cautious corporate chieftain, but to somebody usually considered either a hero or a villain....
abstract: Profile of billionaire investor Wilbur L Ross, who is expected to be nominated by Pres-elect Donald Trump as next commerce secretary; Ross has made career as risk-taking speculator, which has earned him reputation as both hero and villain.
